akn:section.akn:heading: Open season for certain Alaska Native veterans for allotments

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Definitions For the purposes of this section, the terms “veteran” and “Vietnam era” have the meanings given those terms by paragraphs (2) and (29), respectively, of section 101 of title 38.
(e) Regulations No later than 18 months after October 21, 1998, the Secretary of the Interior shall promulgate, after consultation with Alaska Natives groups, rules to carry out this section.
